HomepageView.makeApplicationExplanation: Apply to have credits earned at other universities recognized for modules at Leipzig University. This is useful, for example, if you are transferring from another university to Leipzig University, returning after a semester abroad, or taking courses simultaneously at another university.
HomepageView.viewStatusExplanation: Here you can check the status of your previously submitted application. Enter the 6-digit case number provided to you during the application process. Alternatively, you can find this case number in the overview of your application as a PDF.

sideInfo.viewStatus: Track status using the case number
sideInfo.goToStudy: Once the application is complete, take all relevant documents to the student office

HomepageView.ApplicationCode: Case Number of the Application to Be Called

AccountAdminCreate.UserExists: A user with this name already exists

FilterSelector.SearchAfter: Search for: Case Number, Module Name, University

ApplicationInfoBox.Explanation: Select the course for which you want to have credits recognized. Then enter the details of the credits. You can add as many module assignments as you like.
ApplicationInfoBox.ForeignModule: Modules from other universities to be credited as Leipzig University modules.
ApplicationInfoBox.belongingModules: Only specifically related modules should be written in a module assignment.
ApplicationInfoBox.multipleAssignments: You can add multiple module assignments for the entire application.
ApplicationInfoBox.exactModule: Specify one or more module(s) completed at another university.
ApplicationInfoBox.FillFields: The given fields must be completed for this.
ApplicationInfoBox.CreditSystem: Specify the credit system (ECTS or other).
ApplicationInfoBox.uploadPDF: A PDF file with the official description of the individual module must be uploaded as a module description.
ApplicationInfoBox.ChoseModule: Choose one or more module(s) for which you want to have your credits recognized.
ApplicationInfoBox.ChoseNone: If you cannot find a suitable module, you also have the option of not selecting one.
ApplicationInfoBox.FurtherInformation: Additional information about this module assignment can be provided here, this is optional.
ApplicationInfoBox.ModuleDescription: Module Description: PDF file with the description of the module Automata and Computability

ManagementCreate.ModuleNameExists: Module name or code already exists

StatusDetailView.FormalMistakeExplanation: Your application has been rejected due to formal errors. The module assignments containing formal errors are marked in red. In the module assignment, you will find an explanation of the specific error at the bottom. Please correct all indicated errors. Then you can resubmit your application.
StatusDetailView.FinalDecisionExplanation: A final decision has been made regarding your application. This is only information about the possibility of recognition. To officially have your credits recognized, you must go to the student office. Please bring all relevant documents that prove the completion of the credits to be recognized. If you have further questions about your application, please contact the student office.

SideInfoStudyOffice.fmi: Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science
SideInfoStudyOffice.ActualOfficeHours: Tuesday and Thursday: 9:00 am - 11:30 am and 12:30 pm - 4:00 pm

StatusPanel.NotYetDecided: No decision has been made yet

PanelExternalModulesItem.PointsNum: Points must be specified as a number

PanelInternalModules.NoModulesSelected: No modules of Leipzig University are selected.

ApplicationConfirmationView.NoteCode: Note down the case number. This is necessary to later check the status of your application.

LoginView.InvalidData: Invalid login credentials. Please try again
